ComicInfo.Penciller: Phillip Norwood,Phill Norwood,Michael Kraiger,Leopoldo Durañona,Phill Norwood,Michael Kraiger,Leopoldo Durañona
ComicInfo.Summary: This issue of Dark Horse's premier title features the fantastic climax of Book Two of Leopoldo Duranona's Race of Scorpions, the final episode of the current adventures of Michael Kraiger's radioactive misfit, The Zone, and a special Aliens story by Chris Warner and Randy Stradley that will kick off one of Dark Horse's most exciting projects!
ComicInfo.Title: Sometime in the future...; Zone (Part IV); Part Five: By Water and Stone
ComicInfo.Writer: Leopoldo Durañona,Michael Kraiger,Randy Stradley,Randy Stradley,Michael Kraiger,Leopoldo Durañona
